text: 13.54: Mt 2.23; Mk 6.1; Ru 4.16; 4.22; Zo 7.15Ana mba ŋgu thav vov, wo ŋgu nɨɨŋgera vugi. Ana vugap, mbara vov, mbe Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ mbararagi phena vhen vergap, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin gumgi gu mbigi khɨvav mbe nzuai. Ana Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin mbe nzuaim, mbe ana buni mbararav, ŋgava mbatɨga mbuav khaŋ nzuai, “Kha guma maaŋ kha ndɨkndɨga ndigi? Ana ram muuŋgia kha mirikori ga mbui?
